posting_frequency.strategy: ONE POST PER DAY - Predictable Schedule for Habit Formation
posting_frequency.reasoning: End hooks promise 'every [Day]' - REQUIRES consistency. Same category same day builds returning viewers.

tier_1_chosen.20:00: EVENING PRIME - 6 days/week - US evening (3-4 PM EST), EU late night
tier_1_chosen.21:00: WEEKEND PRIME - Friday only - US early evening, optimal for weekend bingers

optimal_times_utc.reasoning: Prioritized predictability over micro-optimization. 20:00 UTC = 3 PM EST (after-work) + 9 PM CET (evening). Consistent time builds habits.

avoid.04:00-18:00: Daytime hours - lower performance for mystery content
